game.name: Top 10 Soccer Managers
game.description:
Top 10 Soccer Managers is a beautifully-crafted soccer game in which you will have to lead your club to the top of European Football. Play the role of a top soccer manager and let the world show that you have amazing skills to spot the right talent for your team. Buy and sell players, help your team to get ready and schedule match days on your sports calendar. Make sure that you have an effective strategy to win over your competitors in this brand new soccer game for boys. 

Start this game with guiding your own football team. Get them trained until they possess the skills of becoming one of the Top 10 Soccers Managers of the world. Create a character on your own and then focus on getting your team trained under your unvalued supervision. Hope your team wins enough matches to claim for the generous sponsors. We know that you have the guts to lead your players to be on the top of the European football in this free online sports game.
You can control this fun soccer game with the help of the mouse. Your primary objective is to collect as much notoriety as Leicester Citys Claudio Ranieri has accepted this year. It is not easy to control your team when they start performing on the ground. Do your best under the training so that your squad succeeds in their mission. Perform different activities, including managing sponsorships, buying players and altering tactics with an open mind. Hire a scout to take care of you and scope out some young boots! Good luck boys!
